name: Trinh (Bella) Le
about:
Passionate about recruiting for Manufacturing & Trading, especially in Renewable Energy, Oil & Gas, Heavy Industries, Mechanical, Automotive sector
Please contact me through email: trinh.le@manpower.com.vn

experiences.description:
Manpower Vietnam is part of ManpowerGroup – the world’s leading workforce expert.

With offices in over 75 countries and more than 70 years of history, Manpower is the global leader in contingent and permanent staffing, providing organizations of all sizes with a continuum of staffing solutions to enhance business agility and competitiveness.

Manpower Vietnam Company Limited was licensed to operate in Vietnam in 2008. We are the first 100% foreign invested company licensed to provide recruitment and staffing and outsourcing services by the Ministry of Labor, Invalids and Social Affairs (MOLISA). We have been the strategic partner of MOLISA since 2008.
